event: Earliest human presence in present-day Paraguay
Guaraní peoples establish villages and agriculture
Guaraní culture spreads across the Paraguay River basin
Spanish explorers enter the Paraguay River region
Asunción is founded, becoming a colonial hub
Jesuit missions expand among the Guaraní
Jesuits are expelled, ending the mission system
War of the Triple Alliance begins
War ends, devastating population and economy
Chaco War with Bolivia reshapes national territory
Dictatorship ends and democratic transition begins
